title: Akatsuki Bot
subtitle: The New Standard for Discord Management
features_subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your server
feat_list_free:
・Record VC join/leave logs
・NG word detection (Up to 10)
・Anti-Raid Protection (Alerts)
feat_list_pro:
・Web management dashboard
・Spam Protection (Similarity & Mentions)
・Anti-Raid (Mass join protection)
・Member Growth Trends (7 Days)
・20 NG words capacity, Auto Timeout Relief
feat_list_pro_plus:
・Member Audit (Inactivity & Intro detection)
・Auto Self-Introduction Gate
・Growth Trends + CSV Export (Filters supported)
・50 NG words capacity, Support up to 3 servers
roadmap_subtitle: These features are currently under development and will be released sequentially.
roadmap_audit_desc: Identifies inactive members based on roles, intros, and VC activity.
roadmap_antiraid_desc: Detects mass suspicious joins and automatically restricts server access.
roadmap_introgate_desc: Restricts access until a proper introduction is posted.
help_growth_trend: A graph showing the trend of server joins and leaves aggregated by day.
help_heatmap: Aggregates voice channel activity by hour of day to identify active periods.
help_ng_limit: Define specific keywords to be detected and restricted in messages.
help_antiraid: Automatically detects and restricts suspicious mass joins to protect the server.
help_timeout: The duration to automatically timeout users when an NG word is detected.
help_introgate: Restricts server access until a self-introduction is posted in the specified channel.
help_vc_role: Automatically assigns roles based on cumulative voice channel activity time.
help_vc_report: Periodically sends server activity reports to the designated channel.
